title: Police investigating man found dead in Tennessee Avenue apartment
title_page: Police investigating man found dead in Tennessee Avenue apartment
maintext:
Fort Wayne police are investigating a body found in an apartment in the 600 block of Tennessee Avenue today.
At 4:13 p.m., the Fort Wayne Police Department responded to a request for a welfare check on an adult male, who had not been seen or heard from for several days. When officers arrived, they found the man dead in the apartment, according to a news release.
The circumstances around the man’s death are unknown, and it is unclear whether foul play is involved. Detectives and crime scene technicians were processing the scene to collect evidence and trying to find anyone who may have information.
The Allen County Coroner’s Office will release the cause and manner of death at a later date, as well as the man’s identification. The death remains under investigation.
